message.name: PFD
message.description: This message encodes data needed for the GroundStation Primary Flight Display. Should be sent at 20Hz.
message.field: Roll angle in 0.01 degrees. Positive means rolling CW (right down).
Pitch angle in 0.01 degrees. Positive means pitching up.
Yaw angle (magnetic heading) in 0.01 degrees. Positive means yawing CW (turn to the right).
altitude (AGL) in meters.
airspeed in 0.1 m/s.
Battery current in 0.01 A.

message.name: NavD
message.description: This message encodes data needed for the GroundStation Navigation Display. Should be sent at 5Hz.
message.field: Battery voltage in 0.01 Volt.
Cabin Temperature in 0.1 Celcius.
Latitude (WGS84), in 10^-7 degrees.
Longitude (WGS84), in 10^-7 degrees.
Course heading in 0.01 degrees.
groundspeed in 0.01 m/s.

message.name: SystemID
message.description: This message encodes all the data needed for System Identification.
message.field: Ticks elapsed since the system has started.
Aileron control input in raw PWM value. Positive means right wing down.
Elevator control input in raw PWM value. Positive means pitching up.
Rudder control input in raw PWM value. Positive means turning to the right.
Acceleration on the body x-axis in 0.01g. Positive front.
Acceleration on the body y-axis in 0.01g. Positive right.
Acceleration on the body z-axis in 0.01g. Positive down.
Roll angle in 0.01 degrees. Positive means rolling CW (right down).
Pitch angle in 0.01 degrees. Positive means pitching up.
Yaw angle (magnetic heading) in 0.01 degrees. Positive means yawing CW (turn to the right).
Roll rate in 0.1 deg/s. Same sign-convention as roll angle.
Pitch rate in 0.1 deg/s. Same sign-convention as pitch angle.
Yaw rate in 0.1 deg/s. Same sign-convention as yaw angle.

message.name: MagCal
message.description: This message encodes raw magnetometer data.
message.field: Magnetometer raw X reading
Magnetometer raw Y reading
Magnetometer raw Z reading

message.name: SysState
message.description: This message encodes the current system status.
message.field: Current mode of the HACS system

message.name: SysCmd
message.description: This message encodes commands sent by the ground station.
message.field: A set of well-knwon command flags
